name: Multiple Map Marker Filter
author: Kiran Patil

sections.description:
Multiple map marker and filter plugin is useful to display maps on your website posts and pages using shortcode [‘map_filter’], With fully customized icons and settings. Users can hide filter dropdown using [map_filter hide_filter=1].

A Few Feature Highlights

  • Display single and multiple map markers using shortcode
  • Category filter for maps.
  • Custom icons
  • Can customize infowindow by applying style to custom-infowindow class.
  • Free to use and customize.

  • Different map types like Roadmap/Satellite/Terrain/Hybrid.

  • Note :
    To work map filter you need to set map categories first Go to Post-> Map Categories And add categories for map.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

In WordPress:

Go to Plugins > Add New > search for :: Multiple Marker Map Filter :: Press Install Now for the Show notice or message on admin area plugin Press Activate Plugin then assign tags to categories available in your website

To install manually instead:

Upload the Multiple-Marker-Map-Filter  directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress then assign tags to categories available in your website.

Step 2:

To work map filter you need to add map categories first Go to Post-> Map Categories And add categories for map

Step 3:

You need to add Markers to display on map.
